name: smokable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
easy to smoke or able to be smoked: He drew out a crushed cigarette, and with difficulty he smoothed it into a smokable shape. Old cigars are perfectly smokeable if kept in the right condition, but they are not quite as good.
More examplesFewer examplesThe problem started in the 1980s with the appearance of a smokeable form of cocaine.There are people who strictly deprive themselves of every eatable, drinkable, and smokable thing that is in any way unhealthy.
